function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation leading to poor indoor air quality and increased risk of disease transmission.","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne disease transmission among building occupants.","Mitigation":"Implementing proper ventilation systems and air filtration, ensuring regular air exchange, and following indoor air quality guidelines.","Technologies":"Air purifiers, HVAC systems, air quality sensors, and smart ventilation control systems.","People":"Building occupants, especially those spending long hours indoors.","Owner":"Building managers, HVAC technicians, and indoor air quality specialists."},{"Description":"High occupancy density leading to increased risk of disease spread and infection.","Impact":"Increased likelihood of disease transmission in crowded indoor spaces.","Mitigation":"Implementing occupancy limits, spatial reconfiguration, and scheduling to reduce crowd density, along with promoting personal hygiene and sanitation measures.","Technologies":"Occupancy monitoring systems, space utilization analytics, and smart scheduling tools.","People":"Building occupants, facility managers, and public health authorities.","Owner":"Building managers, public health authorities, and facility operations teams."},{"Description":"Insufficient cleaning and sanitation leading to microbial contamination and disease transmission through fomites (objects or surfaces).","Impact":"Higher risk of surface-to-person disease transmission due to contaminated surfaces within the building.","Mitigation":"Implementing regular and thorough cleaning protocols, using antimicrobial surfaces, and promoting hand hygiene practices among occupants.","Technologies":"Surface disinfection equipment, antimicrobial coatings, and smart cleaning management systems.","People":"Building occupants, cleaning staff, and visitors.","Owner":"Building managers, cleaning service providers, and facilities maintenance teams."}]}
